regen.absent_element: situation where the user clicks to skip the movie
regen.new_specification: The movie will stop immediately and transition to the main menu if the user clicks a mouse button during playback.

regen.absent_element: user action to skip the movie
regen.new_specification: If the user clicks the mouse button during the movie, the movie will stop immediately, and the main menu will be displayed.
If the user clicks a mouse button, the movie will be skipped, and the user will be immediately moved to the main menu.

label: If a mouse click is received, this component will terminate the movie.
absence: situation of the a mouse click is received
